author: Shari Savage
title: WATCH: Retired Cop Pulling Bank Security Guns Down Armed Robber

organizations.name: cop pulling bank security guns down armed robber bulgarian militia

text:
Bulgarian Militia Now Defending the Border From the Islamic Invasion 
“There is no doubt in my mind the actions of Brian Harrison saved the lives of those that were employees in the Alpine Bank location on that date and saved his own life,” Winnebago County State Attorney Joe Bruscato told WIFR News . 
Harrison killed Turner in self-defense and in defense of others, Bruscato also said, according to the Rockford Register Star . 
Turner’s obituary stated that he loved science fiction movies and collecting shoes. Clearly he wasn’t wearing his lucky pair the day he tried to shoot a retired cop. 
Hot hand, cool head, totally bad dude. Hats off to hero Brian Harrison. 
Please share on Facebook and Twitter as a tribute to cops everywhere, active and retired. What do you think of Brian Harrison's brave response to this punk? Scroll down to comment below! Advertisement Popular Right Now
